Key Match Events: Randal Kolo Muani scored the first goal for France just before the half-hour mark
Ousmane Dembele scored the second goal for France on 57 minutes
Pre-Game Insights: Didier Deschamps made eight changes to the French team that lost to Italy
Belgium came into the match fresh from beating Israel by the same scoreline
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps was happy with France's reaction and performance against Belgium
Deschamps acknowledged that the performance against Italy was not the worst and that everything is not fixed
Miscellaneous Highlights: This game was a repeat of the Euro 2024 last-16 tie which France won 1-0 in Duesseldorf
Others: The Italians are on top of Group A2 with six points out of six after beating Israel 2-1 on Monday
France and Belgium have three points apiece, while Israel are bottom without a point
The next matches are in October, including Italy playing Belgium in Rome, and Israel meeting France on neutral territory in Budapest
